actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of State should conduct an investigation with respect to the status of those members of the Armed Forces of the United States who are missing in action in Southeast Asia.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of State should conduct an investigation with respect to the status of those members of the Armed Forces of the United States who are missing in action in Southeast Asia.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of State should conduct an investigation with respect to the status of those members of the Armed Forces of the United States who are missing in action in Southeast Asia.
